RIAK_CONSISTENT_GETS.description: Number of strongly consistent GETs coordinated by this node in the last minute

RIAK_CONSISTENT_GET_OBJSIZE_MEAN.description: Mean object size for strongly consistent GETs on this node in the last minute

RIAK_CONSISTENT_GET_TIME_MEAN.description: Mean time between reception of client GETs to strongly consistent keys and subsequent response

RIAK_CONSISTENT_PUTS.description: Number of strongly consistent PUTs coordinated by this node in the last minute

RIAK_CONSISTENT_PUT_OBJSIZE_MEAN.description: Mean object size for strongly consistent PUTs on this node in the last minute

RIAK_CONSISTENT_PUT_TIME_MEAN.description: Mean time between reception of client PUTs to strongly consistent keys and subsequent response

RIAK_CONVERGE_DELAY_MEAN.description: Mean time in milliseconds describing time taken for the ring to converge after ring changes

RIAK_GOSSIP_RECEIVED.description: Number of gossip messages received in the last minute

RIAK_KV_VNODEQ_MEDIAN.description: Median queue size of all local Riak KV virtual nodes in the last minute

RIAK_KV_VNODEQ_TOTAL.description: Total queue size of all local Riak KV virtual nodes in the last minute

RIAK_KV_VNODES_RUNNING.description: Number of local Riak KV virtual nodes running

RIAK_MEMORY_TOTAL.description: Total allocated memory (sum of processes and system)

RIAK_NODE_GETS.description: Number of GETs coordinated by this node, including GETs to non-local vnodes in the last minute

RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_IN_RATE.description: Average number of GET FSMs enqueued by Sidejob
RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_IN_RATE.displayName: Riak - Node Get FSM In Rate

RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_OBJSIZE_MEAN.description: Mean object size encountered by this node within the last minute
RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_OBJSIZE_MEAN.displayName: Riak - Node Get FSM Objsize Mean

RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_OUT_RATE.description: Average number of GET FSMs dequeued by Sidejob
RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_OUT_RATE.displayName: Riak - Node Get FSM Out Rate

RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_SIBLINGS_MEAN.description: Mean number of siblings encountered during all GET operations by this node within the last minute
RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_SIBLINGS_MEAN.displayName: Riak - Node Get FSM Siblings Mean

RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_TIME_MEAN.description: Mean time between reception of client GET request and subsequent response to client
RIAK_NODE_GET_FSM_TIME_MEAN.displayName: Riak - Node Get FSM Time Mean

RIAK_NODE_PUTS.description: Number of PUTs coordinated by this node, where a PUT is sent to a local vnode in the last minute

RIAK_NODE_PUT_FSM_IN_RATE.description: Average number of PUT FSMs enqueued by Sidejob
RIAK_NODE_PUT_FSM_IN_RATE.displayName: Riak - Node Put FSM In Rate

RIAK_NODE_PUT_FSM_OUT_RATE.description: Average number of PUT FSMs dequeued by Sidejob
RIAK_NODE_PUT_FSM_OUT_RATE.displayName: Riak - Node Put FSM Out Rate

RIAK_NODE_PUT_FSM_TIME_MEAN.description: Mean time between reception of client PUT request and subsequent response to client
RIAK_NODE_PUT_FSM_TIME_MEAN.displayName: Riak - Node Put FSM Time Mean

RIAK_PBC_CONNECTS.description: Number of Protocol Buffers connections made in the last minute

RIAK_PIPELINE_ACTIVE.description: The number of pipelines active in the last 60 seconds

RIAK_PIPELINE_CREATE_ONE.description: The number of pipelines created in the last 60 seconds

RIAK_PIPE_VNODEQ_MEDIAN.description: Median queue size of local Riak Pipe virtual nodes in the last minute

RIAK_PIPE_VNODEQ_TOTAL.description: Total queue size of all local Riak Pipe virtual nodes in the last minute

RIAK_PIPE_VNODES_RUNNING.description: Number of local Riak Pipe virtual nodes running

RIAK_READ_REPAIRS.description: Number of read repair operations this node has coordinated in the last minute

RIAK_REBALANCE_DELAY_MEAN.description: Mean time in milliseconds describing time taken for the ring to converge after ring changes

RIAK_RINGS_RECONCILED.description: Number of ring reconciliation operations in the last minute

RIAK_SEARCH_VNODEQ_MEAN.description: Mean number of unprocessed messages all vnode message queues in the Riak Search subsystem have received on this node in the last minute

RIAK_SEARCH_VNODEQ_TOTAL.description: Total number of unprocessed messages all vnode message queues in the Riak Search subsystem have received on this node since it was started

RIAK_SEARCH_VNODES_RUNNING.description: Total number of vnodes currently running in the Riak Search subsystem
